      • getMin

        org.bukkit.util.Vector getMin()
        Gets the minimum corner of this hitbox.
        Returns:
        the Vector representing the minimum corner of this hitbox

      • setMin

        void setMin(org.bukkit.util.Vector vector)
        Sets the minimum corner of this hitbox.
        Parameters:
        vector - the Vector that should be used as the minimum corner of this hitbox

      • intersects

        boolean intersects(org.bukkit.util.Vector origin,
                   org.bukkit.util.Vector angle,
                   org.bukkit.util.Vector hitboxLocation)
        Checks whether or not a given line of sight is intersecting the hitbox. Uses an algorithm adapted from
        Parameters:
        origin - the location that the line of sight starts at
        angle - the direction the line of sight is facing
        hitboxLocation - the location that the hitbox's origin is at
        Returns:
        whether or not the line of sight intersects

      • deepClone

        Hitbox deepClone()
        Creates a copy of this hitbox, cloning the stored vectors as well.
        Returns:
        a new hitbox instance.
